mdRecord.dcterms:title: Floyd High School 1926-27 Boys Sports Team
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The 1926-27 Boys Sports team in uniform for a yearbook-style picture. The people in the photograph are as follows: Joseph Poff principal at left; Carlos Loop teacher & coach at right; Row 1: Tap McNeil, Guy Williams, Sebert Cox Row 2: Ed Lee, Trent Weeks Row 3: Bernard Lee, Harry Kent Russell, Charlie Ray Poff
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Basketball players
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
